org.spongepowered.api.service.permission

Interface SubjectCollection


  • public interface SubjectCollection
    Object that manages subjects of a certain type (user, group, etc).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Subject get(String identifier)
      Returns the subject specified.
      Iterable<Subject> getAllSubjects()
      Returns all subjects.
      Map<Subject,Boolean> getAllWithPermission(Set<Context> contexts, String permission)
      Return all known subjects with the given permission information.
      Map<Subject,Boolean> getAllWithPermission(String permission)
      Return all known subjects with the given permission information.
      String getIdentifier()
      Return the identifier for the type of subjects this collection contains.
      boolean hasRegistered(String identifier)
      Returns whether there is any data stored for the given subject.

    • Method Detail

      • getIdentifier

        String getIdentifier()
        Return the identifier for the type of subjects this collection contains.
        Returns:
        The appropriate identifier

      • get

        Subject get(String identifier)
        Returns the subject specified. Will not return null.
        Parameters:
        identifier - The identifier to look up a subject by. Case-insensitive
        Returns:
        A stored subject if present, otherwise a subject that may be stored if data is changed from defaults

      • hasRegistered

        boolean hasRegistered(String identifier)
        Returns whether there is any data stored for the given subject. The return value of this function does not influence whether or not the result from get(String) should be queried.
        Parameters:
        identifier - The identifier of the given subject
        Returns:
        whether any data is stored

      • getAllSubjects

        Iterable<Subject> getAllSubjects()
        Returns all subjects. The iterator provided by this method may be populated asynchronously. Be aware that for large collections this method may be very resource-intensive
        Returns:
        An iterable providing all subjects stored by this collection.

      • getAllWithPermission

        Map<Subject,Boolean> getAllWithPermission(String permission)
        Return all known subjects with the given permission information. Because no context is passed, only subjects who have this permission globally or subjects which have accurate context calculations are returned.
        Parameters:
        permission - The permission to check
        Returns:
        Any subject known to have this permission set, and the value this permission is set to

      • getAllWithPermission

        Map<Subject,Boolean> getAllWithPermission(Set<Context> contexts,
                                          String permission)
        Return all known subjects with the given permission information.
        Parameters:
        contexts - The context combination to check for permissions in
        permission - The permission to check
        Returns:
        Any subject known to have this permission set, and the value this permission is set to
